item.payload:
Message-Id: <1237726230.394911.25706.nullmailer@svn.kde.org> From: Volker Krause <vkrause@kde.org> Subject: playground/pim/akonaditest/resourcetester To: kde-commits@kde.org Date: Sun, 22 Mar 2009 12:50:30 +0000 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
SVN commit 942677 by vkrause:
Add a safety timeout in case we do not receive the synchronized() signal or the resource hangs during syncing. The first seems to happen randomly if syncing is extremely fast.
M +40 -0 resourcesynchronizationjob.cpp M +1 -1 resourcesynchronizationjob.h
